mapper.select: SELECT "chatId", "type", "sender", "message", "time", "chatRoomId", "userId", u."name", u."profilePhoto" FROM injoy."chat" c inner join injoy."user" u on c."userId" = u."id" where "chatRoomId"=#{chatRoomId} ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT max("time") FROM injoy.chat where "userId"='48' and "type"='ENTER'

SELECT "chatId", "type", "sender", "message", "time", "chatRoomId", "userId", u."name", u."profilePhoto" FROM injoy."chat" c inner join injoy."user" u on c."userId" = u."id" where "chatRoomId"=#{chatRoomId} and "time" >#{time} ORDER BY "time" ASC
